thread.title: Hasbro blames Toys 'R' Us for dismal first quarter

title: Hasbro blames Toys 'R' Us for dismal first quarter
text:
Hasbro blames Toys 'R' Us for dismal first quarter 3:40pm EDT - 00:47 
Toymaker Hasbro fell short of Wall Street expectations for profit in first quarter as bankruptcy of Toys 'R' Us spurred nearly $100 million shortfall in revenue. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Toymaker Hasbro fell short of Wall Street expectations for profit in first quarter as bankruptcy of Toys 'R' Us spurred nearly $100 million shortfall in revenue. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
